cast.name: 大卫·洛麦克斯 David Lomax

trans_title: 二十天玩转阿根廷 第一季
introduction: Meet Robert Mason and David Lomax, two guys equipped with a motorcycle, a CVT licence, and a passport, who know no limits. Where the road ends, their adventure begins. The daredevil duo have set themselves a challenge of a lifetime, to travel across Argentina, 5000 miles, in just 20 days. With a majority of the journey away from civilisation, and tarmac, the two will have their work cut out as they navigate their way through mountains, waters and deserts.
chinese_title: 二十天玩转阿根廷 第一季
